entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023
